long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
# Play more games on the top-left menu.

Football Legends is an exciting online soccer game combining arcade action with soccer strategy. With caricatured representations of famous players, it offers a thrilling and exaggerated soccer experience. Whether solo against AI or multiplayer with friends, it ensures entertaining and competitive gameplay.

âš½ How to Play:
Choose soccer legends and compete in fast-paced matches across various modes like quick match, tournament, and two-player mode. Score more goals than your opponent within the given match time, using special moves for spectacular goals.

ğŸ® Game Controls:

ğŸ® Arrow Keys: Move the player.
âŒ X Key: Pass or slide tackle.
âš½ Z Key: Shoot the ball.
ğŸ”„ C Key: Perform special moves (when available).
